document_data.name: Nalifarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Nalifarn''' was an [[durzagon]] alchemist and chieftain around [[1485 DR]].
document_data.History:
Nalifarn led a clan of [[duergar]]. In 1485 DR, he was approached by the [[pit fiend]] [[Baazka]], who offered an alliance with his [[Red Wizard]] masters. Nalifarn accepted and, with the Red Wizards' help, took control of the [[Firehammer Hold]]. In exchange, the durzagon started manufacturing weapons for the [[Thayan]]s. Nalifarn planned to make the Hold a permanent duergar outpost.

Later, he was killed by an adventuring party hired to search for [[Jekk Ironfist]].
